EmailTemplate.name: Liquor Generic Email Template HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}; {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank for your inquiry that we received via {!Case.Origin} on the {!Case.CreatedDate}.
The following case number: {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created for your inquiry.
Your case has been recorded with having a case type of: {!Case.Type} and a secondary case type of: {!Case.Case_Sub_Type__c}
Your case has a priority of: {!Case.Priority}.
Your case has an SLA due date of: {!Case.SLA_Due_Date__c}.
If you have any further questions in relation to your case please contact {!Case.OwnerFullName} via email on {!Case.OwnerEmail}.
Regards,
Liquor Customer Service
